oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Clothing inventory, Co. C, 27th Ala. Inf. Rgt., CSA
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: This is a clothing return for Co. C, 27th Ala. Inf. Rgt., CSA dated February 3, 1864. Item categories include hats, coats, jackets, pants, shirts, drawers, shoes, socks, caps. They have 11 hats, 8 jackets, 17 pants, 15 shirts, 10 drawers, 15 shoes,; and 29 socks. This is most likely a listing of items issued as the soldiers names are listed. The return was signed by Jabez Cannon. He lived in McKenzie, Tennessee after the war. The reverse of the document has a list of deserters dated Jan. 28, 1864.
